April 15, 1957
Mr. Elmer G. **ulzer, Director
Radio and Television Communications
Indiana University
Bloomington, Indiana
Dear Mr. Sulzer:
Thank you very much for your letter of April 11 regarding the NAEB Fhct Sheet
Service subscription. I have corrected my records as you requested in your
letter. However, because mail, when addressed to a department rather than an
individual, is often lost, our NAEB Fact Sheet Service will continue to be
sen# directly to Mr. Lynch as has been the case in tsar last few mailings.
As was mentioned in ny first letter, the University of Illinois will soon be
sending you a bill for $2.50 for the 1957 service. This too, will probably
come addressed to Mr. Lynch. I will, however, advise the University billing
department to change their records accordingly.
I am sorry you have been bothered by all this detail, Mr. Sulzer, and I hope
it will not occur again.
If you have any questions, please feel free to call on me.
Sincerely,
(Mrs.) Judith B Gans
Secretary
